visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Google searches for vitamin D 2004 - 2022'. The chart should have a subtitle 'Source: Google trends', and it should load data from a CSV file located at 'https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/google-trends-vitamin-d.csv'. The x-axis should be of type 'datetime', and the y-axis should range from 0 to 100 with no title. The tooltip should display the date in the format 'YYYY-MM'. The legend should be disabled.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with specific settings. The chart title is set to 'Google searches for vitamin D 2004 - 2022', and a subtitle 'Source: Google trends' is included. The data for the chart is loaded from a CSV file located at 'https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/google-trends-vitamin-d.csv'. The x-axis is configured as a datetime type, which is suitable for time series data. The y-axis is set to range from 0 to 100, with no title displayed. The tooltip is customized to show the date in the format 'YYYY-MM'. Additionally, the legend is disabled, meaning no legend will be displayed on the chart.
